body_html:
Could you please try installing Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64, uninstall TensorFlow then reinstall it again and follow up if it solves the OpKernel errors?
Do you have both, CPU and GPU TF installations on your machine?
body_text:
Could you please try installing Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64, uninstall TensorFlow then reinstall it again and follow up if it solves the OpKernel errors?
Do you have both, CPU and GPU TF installations on your machine?
body:
Could you please try installing [Visual C++ Redistributable 2015 x64](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=53587), uninstall TensorFlow then reinstall it again and follow up if it solves the OpKernel errors? 
Do you have both, CPU and GPU TF installations on your machine?
